CisAsciiFileOutput_local Class Reference

C++ interface to cisAsciiFileOutput_t functionality for local files. The CisAsciiFileOutput_local class is a basic wrapper around the C cisAsciiFileOutput_t structure and associated functions from the CisInterface.h header. It provides the user with C++ style access to basic ASCII file output operations. More...

Detailed Description

C++ interface to cisAsciiFileOutput_t functionality for local files. The CisAsciiFileOutput_local class is a basic wrapper around the C cisAsciiFileOutput_t structure and associated functions from the CisInterface.h header. It provides the user with C++ style access to basic ASCII file output operations.
